item.title: Golangci Lint Thoughts
item.description: A while back I added golangci-lint to the github actions of all my projects. I never got around to insuring that they all have compliance, which means a lot of my projects look like this: Which is fine. It’s about gradual improvement when I have time and I am able. However the thing that bugs me about linters is that they have ego creep. WHere it moves away from being about reducing the chance of errors happening, into a world of insuring there are the correct number of new lines between functions.
